connector.description: A sink that logs all data that it receives, useful for debugging purposes.

camel.kamelet.log-sink.loggerName.name: camel.kamelet.log-sink.loggerName
camel.kamelet.log-sink.loggerName.description: Name of the logging category to use

camel.kamelet.log-sink.logMask.name: camel.kamelet.log-sink.logMask
camel.kamelet.log-sink.logMask.description: Mask sensitive information like password or passphrase in the log

camel.kamelet.log-sink.marker.name: camel.kamelet.log-sink.marker
camel.kamelet.log-sink.marker.description: An optional Marker name to use

camel.kamelet.log-sink.multiline.name: camel.kamelet.log-sink.multiline
camel.kamelet.log-sink.multiline.description: If enabled then each information is outputted on a newline

camel.kamelet.log-sink.showAllProperties.name: camel.kamelet.log-sink.showAllProperties
camel.kamelet.log-sink.showAllProperties.description: Show all of the exchange properties (both internal and custom)

camel.kamelet.log-sink.showExchangePatte.name: camel.kamelet.log-sink.showExchangePattern
camel.kamelet.log-sink.showExchangePatte.description: Shows the Message Exchange Pattern (or MEP for short)

camel.kamelet.log-sink.showProperties.name: camel.kamelet.log-sink.showProperties
camel.kamelet.log-sink.showProperties.description: Show the exchange properties (only custom). Use showAllProperties to show both internal and custom properties.

camel.kamelet.log-sink.showStreams.name: camel.kamelet.log-sink.showStreams
camel.kamelet.log-sink.showStreams.description: Show the stream bodies (they may not be available in following steps)

camel.kamelet.log-sink.showCachedStreams.name: camel.kamelet.log-sink.showCachedStreams
camel.kamelet.log-sink.showCachedStreams.description: Whether Camel should show cached stream bodies or not.
